aicodehelper.namingprompt.default: {{selectedcode}}{{newline}}suggest good variable names for the code and replace them in code to suggested names.{{newline}}No any other explanations, annotations, comments, descriptions in your response but only the replaced code.
aicodehelper.namingprompt.description:
This is the prompt template used for naming variables
변수이름 작명을 위해 사용되는 프롬프트 템플릿입니다
Shortcut key: (Ctrl+Alt+Shift+N)

aicodehelper.codereviewprompt.default: {{selectedcode}}{{newline}}review this code.{{newline}}explain the good part and the bad part in {{language}}.{{newline}}don't include the original code in your explanation.
aicodehelper.codereviewprompt.description:
This is the prompt template used for a code review
코드리뷰를 위해 사용되는 프롬프트 템플릿입니다
Shortcut key: (Ctrl+Alt+Shift+C)

aicodehelper.refactoringprompt.default: {{selectedcode}}{{newline}}{{newline}}Refactor the code short without changing algorithm.{{newline}}No explanations, annotations, comments, descriptions
aicodehelper.refactoringprompt.description:
This is the prompt template used for code refactoring
코드리팩토링을 위해 사용되는 프롬프트 템플릿입니다
Shortcut key: (Ctrl+Alt+Shift+R)

aicodehelper.commmentingprompt.default: {{selectedcode}}{{newline}}{{newline}}Please comment line by line in this code. Please don't touch(modification,removal) the original code. write comments in {{language}}. No any other explanations, annotations, comments, descriptions except inside code. Show the original source code as it is.
aicodehelper.commmentingprompt.description:
This is the prompt template used for adding code comments
코드주석달기기능을 위해 사용되는 프롬프트 템플릿입니다
Shortcut key: (Ctrl+Alt+Shift+Z)

aicodehelper.generatingprompt.default: {description}={{selectedcode}}{{newline}}{{newline}}Make the code as {description} in {{languageId}} syntax. Please comment line by line in the code. write comments in {{language}}. No any other explanations, annotations, comments, descriptions except inside code.
aicodehelper.generatingprompt.description:
This is a prompt template for generating code based on a description of what you want to create in code
코드로 만들고싶은것에 대한 묘사를 기반으로 하여 코드를 생성해내는 기능을 위한 프롬프트 템플릿입니다
Shortcut key: (Ctrl+Alt+Shift+G)

aicodehelper.APIKey.description:
Please enter your API Key into the input box that appears by pressing the shortcut key (Ctrl+Alt+Shift+Q)
단축키(Ctrl+Alt+Shift+Q)를 눌러서 나오는 입력박스에 API Key를 입력해주세요

aicodehelper.gptkey.description:
No need to be set up. If you want to set your API key, please enter it into the input box that appears by pressing the shortcut key (Ctrl+Alt+Shift+Q).
이 값은 설정할 필요 없습니다. APIKey를 설정하기 원한다면 단축키(Ctrl+Alt+Shift+Q)를 눌러서 나오는 입력박스에 API Key를 입력해주세요.

aicodehelper.language.description:
What language would you like AI to use? (ex: english, korean, vietnamese)
This value replaces {{language}} in the prompt template. Therefore, it will not be applied when using the Asking AI feature (Ctrl+Alt+Shift+M, Ctrl+Alt+Shift+,) where a prompt template setting does not exist.

aicodehelper.temperature.description:
Temperature 0~1 in float
Temperature value will be applied when using the those features (Ctrl+Alt+Shift+M Ctrl+Alt+Shift+, Ctrl+Alt+Shift+.) where a prompt template setting does not exist.

commands.title: List of recent history of asking
